name: RestResponse

fields.name: responseBody
fields.description: Returns or sets the body of the response.

fields.name: headers
fields.description: Returns the headers to be sent to the response.

fields.name: statusCode
fields.description: Returns or sets the response status code.

constructors.name: RestResponse
constructors.description: Creates a new instance of the System.RestResponse class.

methods.name: addHeader
methods.signature: public Void addHeader(String name, String value)
methods.description: Adds a header to the response header map.

description: Represents an object used to pass data from an Apex RESTful Web service method to an HTTP response.
